survey_name: Employee Satisfaction with Workplace AI Tools Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from employees on their satisfaction and experience with AI-powered tools implemented in the workplace.

questions.question_text: How frequently do you use AI-powered tools in your daily work tasks?
questions.client_notes: Use a radio button for single-choice selection. Ensure options cover a broad range of usage frequencies.

script.question_text: How frequently do you use AI-powered tools in your daily work tasks?

questions.question_text: Which of the following AI-powered tools do you use at work? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multiple selections. Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional inputs.

script.question_text: Which of the following AI-powered tools do you use at work? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the AI tools provided by your organization?
questions.routing_logic: All respondents who selected any AI tool in Q2
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale with radio buttons. Ensure the scale is balanced and easy to understand.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the AI tools provided by your organization?
script.routing_logic: All respondents who selected any AI tool in Q2

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the AI tools used in your workplace?
questions.routing_logic: All respondents who selected any AI tool in Q2
questions.client_notes: Use an open-text field to allow for detailed feedback. Ensure the field is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the AI tools used in your workplace?
script.routing_logic: All respondents who selected any AI tool in Q2

questions.question_text: Do you feel that AI tools have improved your productivity at work?
answer_options: No, it has decreased my productivity
